title: Rito need Zac...Rito messaged me?
body: the conversation i just had in a chat... I had a giggle m8... figured i would pass the giggle along... seriously read the picture its pretty funny :P

replies.body: XD WHAT THE HELL DID I JUST READ?
Riot says that Zac needs buff. I agree. :D
~~So funny and original.~~
what do you mean this post is only of the highest quality :P

Isn't that literally what he said?

# #MaybeHeWasntSarcastic #UnlikelyButMaybe

Didin't even post the filfthy frank vid.

Plebian
This.
Why gray out his name?
I didnt want him getting in trouble for impersonating a riot employee..since I know hes not a scammer... also didnt ask him if i could post this so courtesy i guess :P

> I know hes not a scammer

Or at least not a successful one
Best scammer NA :P

fucking hehelarious.
rofl
